pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vintage Sparse PCA for Semi-Parametric Factor Analysis // Provides fast spectral estimation of latent factors in random dot product graphs using the vsp estimator. Under mild assumptions, the vsp estimator is consistent for (degree- corrected) stochastic blockmodels, (degree-corrected) mixed- membership stochastic blockmodels, and degree-corrected overlapping stochastic blockmodels.
